ReinieR89 i have the same problem as you. I think everybody else has it too. Tried to download it again from scratch and still the same problem..

Well ... the real problem is with source nrg file that is faked. When you burn this file the xbox dvd is half empty - without warning files. And now the solution - use UltraISO to rebuild the source file from nrg to iso. Next use standard xFER202 to extract iso and transver all to xbox. The game is working - now I will play with my lovelly wife... Happy New Year 2009 for all good people. Heil for The Pirate Bay :)
transfer all to xbox hdd or burn the dvd, off course :)

Hi there. [I've constructed this fail-safe guide for you guys out there having trouble getting it to work correctly.]

1. After 'converting' the *.nrg file to *.iso using MagicISO, I extracted the contents to a folder on my desktop with xFER (ver. 2.02). 
(xFER would for some apparent reason not let me transfer the archive!) 

2. Then I used FlashFXP to tranfer the extracted ISO to my xbox

3. Then I played the game:)

Best regards, 
X.el_ION.2009
